website_summaries.verdict: Made specifically for kittens, Science Diet formula supports a healthy immune system. Fewer calories per cup for indoor kittens.
pros: No artificial colors, flavors, or preservatives
Can migrate to adult version of this food as kitten grows
Customers report kittens like the taste of this food
cons: Food has an oily texture, which causes some kittens to vomit, according to some pet owners

customer_reviews.title: What happened to you all?!
customer_reviews.text: This food is all my cat would eat. However, since you changed your formula, they have been throwing up and begging for treats more and more (which, believe it or not, they never did). This last bag, they barely touch and I just got done cleaning up 6 spots where my cat threw up this food back to back tonight. I'm disappointed and done with this product. Cancelled my subscription and I am considering getting my money back for this bag.
customer_reviews.author: CourtneyLynn

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend!!
customer_reviews.text: My kittens loved this food! I only just transitioned them to adult food (1+) but they've been eating this kitten food for the past 8 months or so, and I've never had any issues. My cats are brothers, but their constitution is slightly different, so I expected that one of them might not like the same food but they both adapted to it fine and loved eating it. Really happy I stuck with this brand for their adult food too, because the transition has been seamless. Would recommend for anyone with kittens!
customer_reviews.author: VDav

customer_reviews.title: Kittens had blood in stool after eating
customer_reviews.text: The kittens had diarrhea and blood in their stool after eating this. Changed to Putin’s 1 healthy kitten and it immediately took care of the issue!
customer_reviews.author: elsieJ

customer_reviews.title: The delivery was timely the food was exactly what I ordered
customer_reviews.text: HOWEVER...I opened the box and the bag had a knife like split about 7 inches right smack in the middle of the 5 Lb bag. I was in desperate need of the Hills Science Diet veterinarian recommended in door kitty food, so I did not have the time to exchange for a bag that had not been knifed down the center. I am hoping the company will give me a 5 dollar discount for our next bag, as I could potentially be a lifetime customer for their food. Other than that Every thing was good.
customer_reviews.author: audjewel

customer_reviews.title: Veterinarian recommended
customer_reviews.text: I just got a rescue kitten and my Vet gave me a sample of this so I ordered a big bag. I only gave it 4 stars because when offered along side the mature cat food I use for my adult cats, they choose the adult cat food. I stopped using the adult food so they are all eating this. At least I know my baby is getting the nutrition he needs and it can't hurt my adult kitties.
customer_reviews.author: Joy Brooks

customer_reviews.title: It does what I need it to but my fur babies hate it
customer_reviews.text: This food has definitely helped with the odor when my cat uses the litter box. She’s sensitive to most cat food dry and wet. I gave it three stars because my cats hate eating it. They are constantly begging for treats because they’d rather have anything else.
customer_reviews.author: Adrienne

customer_reviews.title: Not Preferred by my Cat
customer_reviews.text: My kitty ate this for a while and seemed to like it just fine, then my mom brought her cat here who has different food, and now neither cat will even touch this stuff. In fact, they pick around it if we try to trick them into eating it. My mom pointed out that the ingredients include a lot of not-meaty products, and the kind she gets does. The cats prefer the Purina One Indoor Advantage.
customer_reviews.author: Moriah

customer_reviews.title: Something changed
customer_reviews.text: I went through a few bags of this since my cat is pretty sensitive to foods and has some hair/skin problems. The last bag I bought, the food had a more orange tint to it and smelled super fishy compared to before. My cats still ate it, but the sensitive one threw up a few times. I think something was changed and am longer buying this unfortunately. And for how expensive this is, it shouldn't happen.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Hill's Science cat food
customer_reviews.text: I have lost two cats recently because of diseases and have decided to buy cat food recommended by my vet. I am feeding my two 'babies' four different brands each day so that there is a variety of nutrition. This brand along with the Blue and Purina are what I buy. Hopefully it will keep my indoor cats well and give them a longer life span.
customer_reviews.author: L. Pease

customer_reviews.title: horrible product for my kitten
customer_reviews.text: Switched to this food for my 6 month kitten after using "Wellness grain free". Charlie Rose loved the Wellness food but was having too soft and loose stools from it. This brand was suggested as a replacement. He wouldn't touch it. After 2 days he would eat just a few kibbles then leave it. Finally after 5 days he started eating it normal but sadly throws it up every couple of days. His stools are better but so what
customer_reviews.author: ineedacoolnickname

customer_reviews.title: Good starter
customer_reviews.text: With my older cat, I was recommended to put him on this brand once when I took him to the vet for urinary problems. He was about 4 at the time. I was told that store brands can cause crystals in the pets urethra. He wasn’t thrilled at first with the switch, but now he eats it. So, I started my newest kitten on this from the getgo and he hobbled it down. If a vet recommends it, I believe it is good, then.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hill's Only Here
customer_reviews.text: My two kittens love Hill's. We adopted the kittens from our local shelter without knowledge of the kind of food they were given. I had bought another brand of food, similar to Hill's and tried to switch them over to it, but they made it clear they wanted Hill's with nothing else mixed in. I am now buying only Hill's and I'm looking to change the dogs over to Hill's. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: OliviaGreen

customer_reviews.title: I know my kitty is getting the best!
customer_reviews.text: My kitten loves this food! She is so healthy and growing well. She seriously loves the taste! I personally love how the bag seals making it so easy for my 2.5 year old to feed the kitty daily by himself. Such a great product! I know my kitty is getting the best!
customer_reviews.author: Healthy Oiling Mama

customer_reviews.title: Top Food
customer_reviews.text: I have given my cat this food since I got her. I love it and so does she. It is small enough for a kitten to eat and she loves the flavor. I have been with Science Diet for over 20 years. I use it for my dogs so it is only natural that I would get it for my kitten as well. I have tried other brands before and nothing that I tried lived up to the results I get with Science Diet. My cat is super soft and shiny.
customer_reviews.author: MG

customer_reviews.title: Decent brand
customer_reviews.text: I use this brand mostly because it keeps our Kitty's litter box from stinking up. Not crazy about all the fillers, but I'm sure it's better than most. I have tried more natural brands in the past but they always end up with a stronger odor in the litter box. I keep switching back to this one for my indoor cat. And our cat is getting the nutrients he needs. He looks very healthy
customer_reviews.author: First time homeowner

customer_reviews.title: Kittens Love It
customer_reviews.text: I have two kittens both male persians. I've been trying different brand kitten foods, including fresh, canned, and dry. Of all the dried types I have purchased, they like this brand and the Purina One Healthy Kitten Formula. Each piece of food is small and bite sized for my kitten's little mouths. Each of my kittens are less than a year old. I like how Hill's uses a portion of the price I paid for this food and donates it through their Shelter Nutrition Partnership. I'm willing to pay a little more money for the kitten food knowing that a portion is donated to help animals have a more balanced nutrition. I will purchase this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: BlueBird

customer_reviews.title: High quality food our kittens ❤
customer_reviews.text: My kittens LOVE this food! We made the gradual switch from a different brand, and we will never look back from HSD. (They eat a little wet food every day as well.) Our girls get regular vet checkups, and their doctor is always pleased with their health and development!
customer_reviews.author: MKB

customer_reviews.title: Best Value, Cats LOVE It Too!!!
customer_reviews.text: This food is a big hit with my two kittens, brother and sister about 3 months old. It helped fix the "intestinal distress" they suffered their first few days after we brought them home. This is also the best value around; the first time we tried this brand we purchased from a big box pet store. The bag was half the size and cost a dollar more than what you get here on Amazon. Add in an additional 5% discount for using the subscribe and save feature and I will never buy my cats food any other way again!!! Thank you Amazon for making it affordable to feed my kittens well.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Felix-Muller

customer_reviews.title: Vet said get this so I did
customer_reviews.text: I love that Amazon asks me if I like the flavor. Yeah, I love it, haha. The scent? Its cat food. It smells like cat food. Not sure what else Im supposed to say. The vet recommended it so I bought it and this is all my little Manx cats eat. Its expensive compared to other cheap cat foods on the market but my vet didn't recommend those so, here I am.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: The best for kittens
customer_reviews.text: Your vet recommends it, it has to be good. My kittens loved it and I knew it was healthy. They loved the flavor which was important to them and healthy which was important to me. The great thing was that their stools had little smell. Definitely a plus. Pricey but what are your kids worth to you.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Almario

customer_reviews.title: Great good and value for the money
customer_reviews.text: Kittens are quite happy with their new food. Kittens are very tiny at 10 weeks old so we add a little water to the dry kibble. They eat it up! No foul smell even when moistened with water and left overnight. Stools aren't foul smelling or liquidity.
customer_reviews.author: Trina

customer_reviews.title: cat likes the food
customer_reviews.text: kitten loves the food and the pieces are small enough for his small mouth/teeth..some foods are not that way..he jumps when I put the food into the dish aka he likes it..cats are finiky--went through 3 others from pet store--he would not eat them and they smell funky in his mouth..yuck
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Batches
customer_reviews.text: I have my dog and my cat on science hills brand. For my cat the only problem I have is that the kibble seems too large for her. She really has to chew it. Then leaves half eaten bits. I think it's just the production issue with batches. I did compare the kibble from another store and they were the same size. A couple of years ago, if I am remembering correctly the kibble was smaller.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Kitty has never turned away from it.
customer_reviews.text: Our kitten has never turned a bowl down. He said me it was his favorite and to keep it coming. Switching over to the adult version when it's time.
customer_reviews.author: Charles K. Moore  II

customer_reviews.title: she's happily chowing down
customer_reviews.text: My new kitten, who's about 8 weeks old, had zero interest in the Meow Mix Kitten food we had bought for her. Once I switched it out with this, she's happily chowing down!! Khloe was a rescue kitty we found at about 2 weeks, so she was bottle fed, then added wet food and I wanted to switch her to dry. And this worked perfect as it's small round pieces for kitten size. Will be buying again!
customer_reviews.author: ESantas

customer_reviews.title: Expensive but worth it
customer_reviews.text: Although this is an expensive kitten kibble, it is loved by the young ones and seems nutritional for them. I have a bowl of this SD Kitten kibble and also the Kitten Chow for the kittens. The kibble bits are very small so is great for the 6 week olds as they transition from mama.
customer_reviews.author: DesertDawgs

customer_reviews.title: My Kitten Didn't Like it
customer_reviews.text: The pellets are too small. My kitten seemed like he wanted to feel the crunch, but the pellets were too small to bite through, so he would swallow some, but overall, he didn't like it. I had to throw most of it away.
customer_reviews.author: Hono Lulu

customer_reviews.title: Great dry food for picky kitties
customer_reviews.text: My almost seven month old kittens very much like this dry food. I mix it 50/50 with a Nutro Max dry food to give them a bit of variety. They get three wet meals a day and are allowed as much dry food as they can eat throughout the day - as per their vet's suggestion. This will change once they hit their year mark. I am very happy with the quality of Hill's Science Diet Kitten Indoor Chicken Recipe Dry Cat Food.
customer_reviews.author: Jodi G.

customer_reviews.title: My cats love it!
customer_reviews.text: My cats have a beautiful coat thanks to this food! I highly recommend for kittens. I’ll be sticking with Science Diet as my kittens grow and transitioning them into the adult Science Diet food.
customer_reviews.author: Hollie Gevertz

customer_reviews.title: Veterinary recommended
customer_reviews.text: It's what the veterinary recommended for the kittens. Cat or kitten food should not cost that much.
customer_reviews.author: James Wright

customer_reviews.title: Kitten doesn't like it as much...
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my 3 month old kitten, because I wanted her to get good quality food. It's very small kibble which I like, but I don't think she enjoys the flavor, because she doesn't finish her food. Prior to this bag I got her just a cheap kitten Meow Mix and she eats every single piece in her bowl. Maybe she dont have taste for expensive food lol..
customer_reviews.author: Mariela Grigorova

customer_reviews.title: Good for my kitties
customer_reviews.text: I adopted 3 kittens May 2019 from our shelter. They were feeding this, so I stayed with it. They have grown into sleek, very healthy cats. It's a bit pricey but I think the value of quality outweighs the cost difference.
customer_reviews.author: V. J. Ashen Studio

customer_reviews.title: Would Order Again
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the kitten food, but ended up receiving the Adult 7+. So you may want to double check your order upon arrival. I'm not basing the review on a mix up at the warehouse, though. Despite this being the wrong formula for my fur baby, he's not only eating it, he loves it. He's putting on the weight his wet food diet failed to, and he's got way more energy. I expect the right formula, when it arrives, will do him good.
customer_reviews.author: Annabelle Slade

customer_reviews.title: This has been my 9 month old kitten's staple since she was 10 weeks old!
customer_reviews.text: She is 9 months old, healthy, strong, beautiful coat, happy and healthy. Love this stuff!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My kitten is OBSESSED
customer_reviews.text: The first time I set out a dish for my kitten she couldn’t eat fast enough! She could smell the food from the bag and wouldn’t stop rubbing on it and that was a good sign just by that reaction lol. She’s been eating this for a while now and she’s a very healthy little baby 😍 best dry kitten food around
customer_reviews.author: HylianGem

customer_reviews.title: The only food my cat will eat
customer_reviews.text: I got this food from the shelter my cat came from, and kept using it. Recently, I ran out of it, and my cat turned her nose up at the replacement I tried to give her until I received a new bag. Her coat is shinny and soft. Her weight is healthy. Once she's over a year, I plan on switching to the adult formula.
customer_reviews.author: Nichole

customer_reviews.title: My kitty loves it and my big cats steal bites.
customer_reviews.text: Vet recommended. My kitty loves it. He always eats most if not all of his food. I would say that's a good guess the flavor is good, lol. He's healthy, shiny and poops good. He will be on it until he's one!
customer_reviews.author: Kiya

customer_reviews.title: Not the same
customer_reviews.text: I bought the first bag at PetCo and my cat loved it. Bought the 2nd bag here and it smelled weird. My cat threw up a few times until I realized it was the food
customer_reviews.author: Roger Vazquez

customer_reviews.title: She likes it!
customer_reviews.text: My kitten readily ate this food and liked it very much. Because she liked it I have to assume the flavor was good because I didn’t want to taste it. Lol
customer_reviews.author: Pamela S. Walker

customer_reviews.title: Cat food
customer_reviews.text: I have an eight month old kitten and have started her on this when I adopted her at 3 months old she loves it and very goid for her
customer_reviews.author: angelykay

customer_reviews.title: Not gnna buy again
customer_reviews.text: My kitty didn’t like it and when she did try it it made her throw up. It smells really bad too. The only positive was the super easy resealable top.
customer_reviews.author: KS

customer_reviews.title: Kitten likes it
customer_reviews.text: The kitten seems to love it. Nice to know he is getting all the nutrients he needs. If the bowl is empty he won’t stop screaming till I fill it up.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: received expired food
customer_reviews.text: I used amazon more than I should like many, so figured I would order food since I order liter. Sadly the food I received was expired and had both my cats puking. I will just stick to petsmart and petco for now on, the price wasn't worth the issues.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Berg

customer_reviews.title: Our kittens health improved on this food!
customer_reviews.text: One of our cats was urinating on the floor frequently. Someone mentioned that it could be a way to communicate there is something wrong with her urinary system, typically the kidneys or a urinary tract infection. They recommended changing the food to this brand. We did. The litter box was used again! And both our cats have beautiful sleek coats! They are very sleek and muscular.
customer_reviews.author: Bunn Family

customer_reviews.title: Healthy from beginning throughout life.
customer_reviews.text: It's all about Merlot, the cat. If she likes it it's a winner!! And it seem the in the stars. You' re the Winner it! Hurray for , Hill's Science Dry cat food for kitten.
customer_reviews.author: Daisy Harley-Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my babies
customer_reviews.text: The crunchies are so small and perfect for my babies that are just starting out the transition to solids. They love it and it is easy for them to eat.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Kitty LOVES IT!
customer_reviews.text: So far my kitten has enjoyed this food so much! We already purchased this twice and will more than likely be using it for a long time, at least until she turns one. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Fatyma Echeverria

customer_reviews.title: My cats LOVE this food!
customer_reviews.text: They prefer this over wet food and it keeps the healthy and active. I love this brand worked really well for my 19 year old cats and now my new 7 month old kittens have been enjoying it for the last 4 months as well. Bravo! Bit pricey, but it is worth the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Tristan

customer_reviews.title: Healty happy kitty.
customer_reviews.text: This is a little expensive but well worth the price. My cat loves the taste and her coat is bright and shiny. She has very healthy poops. Yes I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product
customer_reviews.text: Kitten loves it , easy transition from wet food to dry with this product, I also work at an animal hospital and this brand is highly recommended so great purchase
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: Kitty loves it.
customer_reviews.text: My spoiled kitten only likes this kind of food. I've tried several others and she rejects every one. I guess I'm stuck with it.
customer_reviews.author: Clint

customer_reviews.title: Creates smaller stool better digestion
customer_reviews.text: Brand the shelter gave me and kitten loves it and not to be gross but makes her stool very small as package says it will,I can barely find it in litter box
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Hill

customer_reviews.title: Product was packaged well and was received quickly.
customer_reviews.text: I received the kitten food very quickly, and it was packaged well -- no damage to product. My seven-month-old kitten likes it a lot, and hasn't had any digestive issues with it. Our vet says to keep "the baby" on kitten kibble until she is a year old.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT PRODUCT !
customer_reviews.text: EXCELLENT PRODUCT BUT COST IS HIGH. I LIKE SCIENCE DIET BRANDS BUT I CONSTANTLY LOOK WHERE I CAN BUY THEM FOR GOOD PRICE.
customer_reviews.author: AuntySara Wilkerson

customer_reviews.title: Must taste really good
customer_reviews.text: My kittens and cats prefer this over the adult version. The adult pebbles are too big and awkward and hard so they were really hating life. I had to buy this again and their excitement blew me away!
customer_reviews.author: Emilio’s Roommates

customer_reviews.title: Not for us
customer_reviews.text: I like the tiny bits, but kitten didn’t like. Wasn’t filling either, she was constantly hungry. We’re back to kitten chow
customer_reviews.author: Ev

customer_reviews.title: YourCat will GROW and thrive full of energy.
customer_reviews.text: Your Cat will GROW!! they enjoy the taste and there thriving full if energy.
customer_reviews.author: MR. R TAP

customer_reviews.title: Best Cat Food!
customer_reviews.text: Our two 6 month old kittens love this food. I also used Science Diet for another cat I had and he lived to be 15. So yes, you pay more, but this is excellent quality food, that will help keep your cat healthy for years.
customer_reviews.author: USC90

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE, this food is CAT CRACK 😜
customer_reviews.text: My 100% indoor panthers tore through the cardboard shipping box AND the plastic bag to get at this food. (They are already a bit on the chunky side, so it’s not like they were starving 😂.) I was annoyed because they ruined the bag and I was looking forward to using the Velcro top. Needless to say, 5 stars for scent and taste!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awful farts
customer_reviews.text: Gave my cat the worst gas, and stomach bloating so much so that she earned the nickname Stinky Kitty, 2 stars because it didn’t kill her or break her skin out.
customer_reviews.author: LS

customer_reviews.title: It’s science
customer_reviews.text: Our two kittens like it and they’re very healthy, so it must work.
customer_reviews.author: ReconMarine1969

customer_reviews.title: My Kitten Always Finished His Kitten Food
customer_reviews.text: My kitten has eaten this food for nearly a year. I can tell you that he never snubbed it. As cat owners can tell you, cats are particularly finicky, so I am sure our Loki likes it.
customer_reviews.author: Deirdre

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Kitten loves it! We feed all if are animal's hills science diet! And it does wonders!
customer_reviews.author: BlueJay and Bunny

customer_reviews.title: Small kernels
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old cat can’t digest adult food and most kitten brands but this one he’s eating it so good.No sickness at all small enough kernels the smell don’t make him walk away . I’m going to have to buy the big bag!
customer_reviews.author: Heriberto I Arce

customer_reviews.title: My Ragdoll loves this food, and so does his digestive system and his body!
customer_reviews.text: My ragdoll absolutely loves his Science Diet Kitten food. He was just fixed at 6 months old and is a very healthy 10.5 lbs! He has not had any accidents, which was an issue I had with my first cat using what I would consider a cheaper more unhealthy competitor. I am very impressed and will continue to feed Science Diet for the life of my best friends.
customer_reviews.author: NickMons

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Our kitten really likes the flavor over the other food for kittens. It also cured her bad breath.
customer_reviews.author: Ward

customer_reviews.title: Helps with kitty farts
customer_reviews.text: Our kitten had a bad gas problem the first couple weeks after we brought him home from the humane society. When I say this, I mean he had the worst silent but deadly farts and a lot of them. While he still occasionally farts, this food seems to have decreased the frequency of the farting.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Purrr
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves this food and after searching all others, I think this is the best choice for my house kitten.
customer_reviews.author: Erica Hainstock

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: One of my two kittens ate some litter so I knew there was a nutrient problem and made the switch. So glad I did.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: I recently learned that science diet has corn meal in ...
customer_reviews.text: I recently learned that science diet has corn meal in it. It's a filler that has no nutricianal value. My cats were very healthy and shiny while eating this food, but the ate a lot. I switched them to a food wothougt fillers and I find they poop less and they eat less
customer_reviews.author: ArmyWifeyMommy

customer_reviews.title: My cats love this stuff!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my Bengal kitten and he buries it like we're going to take it away or something lol! My older Bengal eats it too, must be good stuff!
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea Layton

customer_reviews.title: Best cat/kitten food
customer_reviews.text: Have been using science diet for over 15 years with several different cats. They all love it and best of all they have all been healthy. All my cats have had the best, softest and shiny fur thanks to Science Diet. Recommended by any vets I have used over the years. So great full for Science Diet!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Ann

customer_reviews.title: Science Diet is the best kitten food!
customer_reviews.text: My 6 month kittens love this food, I had used another premium brand, but was told by PetSmart that Science Diet was superior to what the kittens had been eating. I’ve noticed an improved coat and luster. I’ve also notice they are more active and they litter doesn’t smell quite as strong.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality food and results
customer_reviews.text: My cats love this and seems to be great for their digestion as they have no more gas.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Scheffer

customer_reviews.title: no more than I had it in his bowl he had devoured it he loved it and begging for more and he is an ...
customer_reviews.text: I have a little kitten that's about 6 months old I've been buying a bag of cat food outdoor food for him. I changed over to this brand cuz he needs to be eating kitten food, no more than I had it in his bowl he had devoured it he loved it and begging for more and he is an indoor cat.
customer_reviews.author: Paula

customer_reviews.title: Recommended by the Breeder
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect, the kitten loves it and it is wha the breeder used!
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Great food!
customer_reviews.text: My kittens love this food! Had God's nutrients for growing fur babies and they'll love the taste.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Bowes

customer_reviews.title: Full of nutrition for kittens but smelly aroma
customer_reviews.text: This product is good for kittens but can be annoying for an owner to smell because the scent is a bit strong and doesn’t have the best aroma but it is full of nutrition that will help your cat grow strong and healthy.
customer_reviews.author: Mohammed ahmed

customer_reviews.title: Best Cat Food Made
customer_reviews.text: The best Cat food you can buy. This stuff makes your cat's coat very shiny. Small pieces are great for kittens and they love it. I have fed my cats science diet and they lived to be very old cats.
customer_reviews.author: chris berbette

customer_reviews.title: Kitty likes it a lot!
customer_reviews.text: My kitty loves this. I open the bag and she comes running. That’s a good sign I take it. (:
customer_reviews.author: Renee Sentino

customer_reviews.title: We need to be recharged for a refund!
customer_reviews.text: 2-13-19 l received 7lb Hills Science Diet dry kitten food. Our kittens had been eating this food previously but would not eat from the new bag. Amazon refunded our money and said to keep the food. After 4 days we tried the food again and they have been eating it ever since. Please charge us for the 7lb. Thanks for your attention. We will ordering more as needed.
customer_reviews.author: Judie Szeg

customer_reviews.title: My kittens love this!
customer_reviews.text: They certainly come running when they hear me scoop some of this for their bowls! With Science Diet, I feel completely safe giving this to the little kittens.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Howard

customer_reviews.title: Our 2 little rescue kittens love it
customer_reviews.text: We combine this with Blue Gourmet Kitten wetfood and our kittens are happy and healthy and have beautiful coats. Even our older cat eats this in preference to his other kibble.
customer_reviews.author: Flying99

customer_reviews.title: kittens wouldn’t eat shipped food
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this as there was none of this formula at the time at our local store. We had 4 kittens that gobbled this formula up when bought at the local pet store-all of them refused to eat any food from this bag. Not even the outside cat who eats anything, or the dogs would eat it. I didn’t think the other reviews were right when they had said this same scenario-but it was true. In the trash it went.
customer_reviews.author: mamab

customer_reviews.title: I’ve been feeding Science Diet to my cats for years.
customer_reviews.text: All of my cats like this brand and it was originally recommended by my vet.
customer_reviews.author: T. DeJarlais

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Love this cat food, my cat loves this food also. He always tried to bite through the bag when I first get my order. And gets so excited when I put it in his bowl
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Feel good about feeding this!
customer_reviews.text: Cats like this, ours are under 1 years old. Feel good about feeding this!
customer_reviews.author: progress

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Pricey but well worth it. Veterinarian recommended and two kittens in a two approved.
customer_reviews.author: Jo Green

customer_reviews.title: I purchase every few months, we only have one kitten
customer_reviews.text: Not a bad food for the price. I work at an animal hospital and I love that this is NOT grain free! People think they know everything about animal nutrition and they don't, grain free is not all that great.
customer_reviews.author: Maizy86Top Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Yes, it’s cat food in small chunks
customer_reviews.text: Asking me to review the flavor? Come on amazon, it’s cat food.
customer_reviews.author: Judy L. Kinder

customer_reviews.title: My cat lived to be over 25 year old and I only used this brand. Want a healthy, strong cat? Get this brand!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this brand for years and years and it is the only food I use for my cat. My last cat lived to be 25 and this brand is all that I fed him. Best brand I have have used and the years have proven that over and over. Thank you Science Diet for keeping my cats healthy and strong for years and years!
customer_reviews.author: Mitchell e Valesca

customer_reviews.title: Happy, Healthy Kittens!
customer_reviews.text: Kittens are happy and healthy! We adopted two kitties from the local animal shelter, which is where they were first fed Hill's. We were given a couple samples and when I found out our vet feeds her several cats and dogs Hill's Science Diet, I knew we would continue to give it to our kittens. It's been close to two months and they are doing great!
customer_reviews.author: Erin E Wright

customer_reviews.title: Very healthy food for kitten
customer_reviews.text: My kitten loves this food. Will continue to feed her this until she’s a year old. She was adopted from SPCA & that’s what they feed them. Lucky kitty!
customer_reviews.author: Rosebud

customer_reviews.title: Delicious
customer_reviews.text: My 2 month old kitten loves Hill’s. So, the review is based on her experience.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Silver

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: I love the fact that I am able to reseal the bag and store it easily. it's great for my cat and they seem to love it, because they always clean their bowls. I love know that my kittens are eating healthy.
customer_reviews.author: Ali

customer_reviews.title: Very good and nutritious for kittens
customer_reviews.text: My kitten liked it fine, since he was raised on it, but actually, every morning he rushes to Purina Dental Health for adult cats while waiting for his wet food.
customer_reviews.author: swrkin

customer_reviews.title: Shiney coat
customer_reviews.text: This Science Diet makes my feral.s cats coats full and shiney Also the cats chose it over other brands and I feel it gives a little More edge to fight the bad weather
customer_reviews.author: Lam

customer_reviews.text: My cat seems go like this but I still can't understand the [feeding] Directions as stated. Seriously, read it 17 times, makes no sense. Please interpret.
customer_reviews.author: Jackster

customer_reviews.title: Good for cats.
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves it. Her coat seemed to get shininier and thicker. She doesn't over eat anymore, and she seems happier.
customer_reviews.author: Julia Rosen

customer_reviews.title: Kitten loves it
customer_reviews.text: My kitten loves it. The size is perfect to fit in my storage bin without needing to be emptied out of the bag.
customer_reviews.author: German

product_meta.title: Hill's Science Diet Dry Cat Food, Kitten, Indoor, Chicken Recipe
product_meta.description:
Size:3.5 LBDuring your cat's first year of life, you want to feed nutrition that supports everyday health and digestion. Hill's Science Diet Indoor Kitten dry food is specially formulated to fuel the energy needs of kittens with an indoor lifestyle so they get the best start in life. Made for kittens, this cat food made with natural ingredients uses DHA from fish oil to support brain health and eye development. Balanced minerals promote strong teeth and bones, while natural fibers promote healthy digestion for your young cat, and easier litter box clean-up for you. There’s more to love with the new look of Science Diet. Some of our products also have new names, new kibble shapes & new formulas.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Hill’s Pet Nutrition’s Mission: To help enrich and lengthen the special relationships between people and their pets.

More than 220 veterinarians, food scientists, technicians and Ph.D. nutritionists at Hill's develop all of Hill's pet foods to meet the needs of your pets. Hill’s only accepts ingredients from suppliers whose facilities meet stringent quality standards and who are approved by Hill's. Not only is each ingredient examined to ensure its safety, we also analyze each product's ingredient profile for essential nutrients to ensure your pet gets the stringent, precise formulation they need.

Hill’s uses only high-quality ingredients including real chicken, lamb or salmon protein. Hill’s dry pet foods have quality protein as the first ingredient and provide clinically proven antioxidant benefits. Plus, they’re made with natural ingredients (plus vitamins, minerals & amino acids) and never contain artificial colors, flavors, preservatives or chicken by-product meal.

Hill’s food, shelter & love program donates food to shelters across the country, providing the proper nutrition that helps pets find their way to loving homes. With every purchase of Science Diet you help feed over 100,000 homeless pets every day, 365 days a year.
feature_bullets: Dry kitten food with natural fibers to promote healthy digestion and easy litter box clean up
Small kibble with dha from fish oil to support healthy brain and eye development for young cats
Promotes strong bones and strong teeth with balanced minerals
Add variety to meal time with our tasty hill's science diet kitten healthy cuisine roasted chicken & rice medley
Made in the USA with global ingredients you can trust
